title: Agent Skill Frontmatter
description: Schema for the YAML frontmatter in Agent Skills SKILL.md files. See https://agentskills.io/specification for the full specification.

name.description: Skill name in kebab-case. Must match the parent directory name. Only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens are allowed. Cannot start or end with a hyphen, and consecutive hyphens are not permitted. Note: the specification also allows Unicode lowercase letters.

description.description: Describes what the skill does and when the agent should use it. Include specific keywords that help agents identify relevant tasks.

license.description: License for the skill (e.g., "MIT", "Apache-2.0"). Can be a license name or reference to a bundled license file.

compatibility.description: Environment requirements such as intended product, system packages, or network access needs. Most skills do not need this field.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs for client-specific properties not defined by the spec (e.g., author, version).

allowed-tools.description: Space-delimited list of pre-approved tools the skill may use (e.g., "Bash(git:*) Read"). Experimental: support may vary between implementations.
